comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Captain Luther Lochman von Wedekind was a medical officer in the U.S. Navy. jama.ama-assn.org/cgi/reprint/106/12/1023-a.pdf has brief biographical details in the report of his death in 1935.

comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content: took command of hospital ship USS Solace De8, 1912 en.wikipedia.org/wiki/USS_Solace_(AH-2)

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: I started an entry in Wikipedia: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Luther_Lochman_von_Wedekind Luther Lochman von Wedekind. Medical Director, Captain, U. S. Navy, retired, New York ; College of Physicians and Surgeons, Medical Department of Columbia College, New York, 1886 ; entered the navy in 1888 and retired in 1928 ; aged 71 ; died, Nov. 24, 1935, of chronic myocarditis.
